settings.title: Settings
settings.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
settings.password_updated_success: Your password has been updated successfully!
settings.theme_requires_login: You need to be registered to change the theme
settings.preferences_updated_success: Your preferences have been updated successfully!
settings.no_posts_yet: You haven't submitted any posts yet
settings.share_something: Share something interesting with the community
settings.reduce_animations_description: Reduces interface animations to improve performance
settings.min_votes_help: Only news with this number of votes or more will be shown
settings.confirm_delete: Do you confirm that you want to delete your account?
settings.delete_warning: Your account will be hidden but can be restored within 15 days. After that period, all your data will be automatically deleted.
settings.push_notifications_description: Receive notifications directly to your device
settings.push_permission_required: Permission required to enable push notifications
settings.push_not_supported: Push notifications are not supported in this browser
settings.push_blocked: Push notifications are blocked. Please enable them in your browser settings
settings.notification_votes: Votes on your posts and comments
settings.email_verification_description: Your email address has not been verified yet. Please check your inbox for the verification email. If you haven't received it, you can request a new link.
settings.verification_email_sent: A new verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
settings.verification_email_error: Error sending verification email. Please try again later.
settings.verification_email_throttle: You have reached the sending limit. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
settings.privacy_description: Control what information is visible on your public profile
settings.hide_karma_description: Hides your karma and level on your public profile
settings.hide_achievements_description: Hides your achievements on your public profile
settings.hide_comments_description: Hides your comments list on your public profile
settings.federated_account_description: Your account is linked to a Mastodon instance. Email and password management is done from your home instance.
settings.telegram_account_description: Your account is linked to Telegram. Identity management is done from your Telegram account.
settings.active_sessions_description: Manage devices where you are logged in

federation.title: Federation (ActivityPub)
federation.description: Share your content with other Fediverse instances
federation.info: Federation allows your content to be visible and interacted with from other Fediverse platforms like Mastodon, Lemmy, etc.
federation.enable_description: Create an ActivityPub profile that other Fediverse users can follow. Once enabled, your posts will be federated by default, but you can choose for each post whether to share it or not.
federation.handle_description: Share this handle so other Fediverse users can find and follow you
federation.default_federate_description: Your new posts will be automatically federated. You can change this individually when creating each post
federation.indexable_description: Allow your profile to appear in Fediverse directories and searches
federation.show_followers_description: Show the number of followers on your public profile

sessions.title: Active sessions
sessions.description: These are the devices that have logged into your account. Revoke access to any session you don't recognize.
sessions.confirm_revoke_all_description: {count} sessions on other devices will be logged out. You will need to log in again on those devices.
